verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, and go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and there I will cause thee to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>.
Then I went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H2009>and<s%>, behold, he was <S%H6213>making<s%> a <S%H4399>work<s%> on the <S%H70>wheels<s%>.

And when the <S%H3627>vessel<s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H2563>clay<s%> was <S%H7843>marred<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3335>potter<s%>, he <S%H6213>made<s%> it <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, as <S%H5869>seemed<s%> <S%H3474>good<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter<s%> to make <S%H6213>it<s%>.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3201>cannot<s%> I <S%H6213>do<s%> with you as this <S%H3335>potter<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. <S%H2563>Behold<s%>, as the clay in the <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, so are ye in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

At what <S%H7281>instant<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> concerning a <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and concerning a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, to pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> and to break <S%H5422>down<s%> and to destroy <S%H6>it<s%>;

if that <S%H1471>nation<s%>, concerning which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil<s%>, I will <S%H5162>repent<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I <S%H2803>thought<s%> to do unto <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And at what <S%H7281>instant<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> concerning a <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and concerning a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> and to plant <S%H5193>it<s%>;

if they <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, that they <S%H8085>obey<s%> not my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, then I will <S%H5162>repent<s%> of the <S%H2896>good<s%>, wherewith I <S%H559>said<s%> I would benefit <S%H3190>them<s%>.

Now <S%H559>therefore<s%>, speak to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3335>Behold<s%>, I frame <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H2803>you<s%>, and devise a <S%H4284>device<s%> against <S%H7725>you<s%>: return ye now every <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

But they <S%H559>say<s%>, It is in <S%H2976>vain<s%>; for we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> our own <S%H4284>devices<s%>, and we will <S%H6213>do<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> after the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H7592>Ask<s%> ye now among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, who hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> such <S%H1330>things<s%>; the virgin of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%>.

Shall the <S%H7950>snow<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H5800>fail<s%> from the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>? or shall the <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H5140>flow<s%> down from <S%H2114>afar<s%> be dried <S%H5428>up<s%>?

For my <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H6999>me<s%>, they have burned incense to <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H3782>gods<s%>; and they have been made to stumble in their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, in the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H7635>paths<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H5410>bypaths<s%>, in a <S%H1870>way<s%> not cast <S%H5549>up<s%>;

to <S%H7760>make<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8292>hissing<s%>; every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> thereby shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and <S%H5110>shake<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>.

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them as with an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%>; I will <S%H7200>show<s%> them the <S%H6203>back<s%>, and not the <S%H6440>face<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3212>they<s%>, Come, and let us <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> against <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>; for the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, nor <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, nor the <S%H1697>word<s%> from the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>. <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with the <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, and let us not give <S%H7181>heed<s%> to any of his <S%H1697>words<s%>.
Give <S%H7181>heed<s%> to <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, and <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that contend with <S%H3401>me<s%>.

Shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> be <S%H7999>recompensed<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>? for they have <S%H3738>digged<s%> a <S%H7745>pit<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> how I <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H7725>them<s%>, to turn away thy wrath from <S%H2534>them<s%>.

Therefore deliver <S%H5414>up<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and give <S%H5064>them<s%> over to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and let their <S%H802>wives<s%> become <S%H7909>childless<s%>, and <S%H490>widows<s%>; and let their <S%H582>men<s%> be <S%H4194>slain<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>, and their young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5221>smitten<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

Let a <S%H2201>cry<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, when thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> upon <S%H3738>them<s%>; for they have digged a <S%H7745>pit<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H2934>me<s%>, and hid <S%H6341>snares<s%> for my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

Yet <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> all their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> against me to <S%H4194>slay<s%> <S%H3722>me<s%>; forgive not their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, neither blot <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> from thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>; but let them be <S%H3782>overthrown<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>; deal thou with them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of thine <S%H639>anger<s%>.
